history.text: Hello!
Hello!
Have you seen Bruce Almighty?
Yes I have actually
Have you?
It's a comedy from 2003 staring Jim Carrey as Bruce Nolan.
Oh maybe not then, I always get that confused with Evan Almighty
Have you seen it?
I have! It's funny. It got a good cinema score but only 48% on rotten tomatoes.
Typical I guess
Have you seen Evan Almighty, are they similar?
The one I'm thinking of is about a man building an Ark
I know who Jim Carrey is but I can't think of the other actors name
I'm not sure about that, but I do know in this movie Jim Carrey stars as a down on his luck reporter.
Ok, two different story lines
He is in a relationship with a woman named Grace staring Jennifer Aniston but has a mild crush on his co-worker, so you can imagine there's a little bit of conflict there.
lol yes, I can just imagine
Are you a Jim Carrey fan in general?
Bruce, played by Carrey, ends up complaining to God and God offers him the chance to be God for a week.

Ok wow, two different story lines but still 
similar to the other movie I was telling you about.
Do you typically enjoy watching comedies?
yes I do
What about you?
When you watch Bruce Almighty, note that Bruce gains special powers in being God, creating some hilarious situations!
Will do. I can just imagine how funny it is lol
I liked the part where Bruce even used his powers to cause extreme events to happen, like a meteor to harmlessly land near a cookoff!
Wow lol
Eventually, he starts to hear voices and asks God what they were, who responds that they're prayers. So Bruce goes onto make a prayer email system to deal with the massive influx.
Wow, interesting. I have to check it out.
To deal with the situation he caused, he ends up making a mass response system granting 'yes' to all prayers.
lol interesting
He thinks this will make everyone happy, but I'm sure you can imagine how it turns out.
lol absolutely
Does he stick with Jennifer Aniston in the end or no?
Yeah! He totally did and even proposed on live tv in the movie!
That's the end of the conversation, I don't want to tell you the ending. It makes me feel bad.
Thanks!

uid2response.feedback: The other user gave me some exciting Information regarding the movie without telling me too much. He/she definitely has me interested in watching the movie.
